comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of Sept 14, 1915 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10610F83C5512738... mentions these men in relation to a possible plot to cripple the allies by causing a strike of longshoremen. W.P. Dempsey was secreatary and treasurer of the Longshoremen's Union. O'Connor (this article has P.V. rather than T.V. O'Connor, but other news articles have T.V. as his initials) was President of the International Longshoremen's Union. Dennis D. Driscoll is described as an active labor leader.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of Sept 13, 1915 has more about the plot. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10A10F83C5512738...
